definition: to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)

sentences.english: China’s leaders promise to hunt down and punish hoarders and speculators.
sentences.chinese: 中國領導人承諾嚴查和懲罰囤積居奇和投機倒把分子。

sentences.english: Chengdu Police has begun severely punishing such fraudulent activities that prevent relief supplies from getting to the quake victims.
sentences.chinese: 成都警方正嚴查非法獲取和使用賑災物資的行爲。

sentences.english: China's leaders promise to hunt down and punish hoarders and speculators.
sentences.chinese: 中國領導人承諾嚴查和懲罰囤積居奇和投機倒把分子。

sentences.english: Fifth, strengthen supervision, thorough investigation of violations, to ensure proper operation and healthy development.
sentences.chinese: 加強監管，嚴查違規，確保規範經營，健康發展。

sentences.english: With the two-month nationwide thorough investigation of "Wine driving" action coming to an end.
sentences.chinese: 隨着爲期兩個月的全國嚴查“酒駕”行動進入尾聲。

sentences.english: Shenzhen investigates rigorously the fees trick of telecommunication postal service.
sentences.chinese: 深圳嚴查電信郵政資費貓膩。
